text: mr. president Donald Trump and his wife
Melania the first lady walking into the
National Cathedral there it was George
HW Bush's express wish that the current
president the 45th President of the
United States be in attendance at this
funeral Washington held another big
funeral list some of that of Senator
John McCain and Donald Trump was not at
that funeral but he is at this one and
that was the express wish of course of
George HW Bush totally fitting and
proper that the current president would
be there for the funeral of a previous
president Melania Trump they're taking
her seat alongside Barack Obama saying
hello of course to all of the former
presidents and first ladies Donald Trump
also greeting the former president not
the easiest of relationships that these
leaders have necessarily with the
current president but in this
circumstance they are all there to pay
tribute to George HW Bush and to his
passing and to by extension the Bush
family
